Detailed Description

template<unsigned DIM1, unsigned DIM2, unsigned DIM3, unsigned DIM4>
class FourthOrderTensor< DIM1, DIM2, DIM3, DIM4 >

FourthOrderTensor

A class of fourth order tensors (i.e. tensors with four indices), over arbitrary dimension.

Definition at line 49 of file FourthOrderTensor.hpp.

Set to be the inner product of a matrix another fourth order tensor, contracting on first component, ie. sets this tensor to be R, where R_{abcd} = X_{aN} T_{Nbcd}
